global_effect_texture.description: A collection of grayscale textures suitable for global effect overlays and gradients, ranging from frosted diffusion to granular patterns and reflective ripples.

textures.name: Smooth Frosted Glass
textures.description: A smooth, diffused frosted glass texture with a soft, uniform gradient from light gray to dark gray. Ideal for creating subtle, blurry overlays or soft light diffusion effects.
textures.usage_notes: Best used for soft focus effects, background blurs, or adding a subtle, non-distracting texture to gradients.

textures.name: Granular Brushed Metal
textures.description: A fine, granular texture resembling sandblasted or brushed metal. The surface shows minute, uniform speckles with a subtle gradient showing directional lighting.
textures.usage_notes: Use to add a tactile, industrial feel to gradients. Great for creating textured metal surfaces or gritty overlays.

textures.name: Reflective Rippled Water
textures.description: A complex, high-contrast texture of rippled water with strong reflections. The pattern is organic and wavy, creating a dynamic and shimmering effect.
textures.usage_notes: Ideal for creating dynamic, organic gradient effects. Use for water simulations, reflective surfaces, or abstract patterned overlays that break up flat gradients.
